website_summaries.verdict: Aside from a few quirks, this is a quality table tennis set made by a reliable name in the industry that backs the product with a 30-day warranty.
pros: Generates enthusiasm from players who love the sturdy build of the paddles and the spin they are able to achieve
cons: The rubber coating around the paddle edges has the tendency to peel off with typical use
The texture of the handles is somewhat rough
A few owners thought the balls could be more responsive

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles, not so good balls
customer_reviews.text: Really like these paddles and the way they impart wicked spin on the ball. As for the balls that came with the set, they are no star 40+, so I bought some good 3 star balls locally. Hopefully these paddles will deliver long service.
customer_reviews.author: CastAway

customer_reviews.title: Not teenager proof - broken in less than 2 mos
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these along with a ping pong table for my sons 14th birthday. We've had them less than 2 months and already the handle is broken on one and the rubber has peeled off of another paddle. Granted my son has had several ping pong parties with his buddies but otherwise he only plays ping pong a couple times a week. I would have expected them to hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: There still may be quality control issues with the rubber letting loose!
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviews, the surface has started to peel on ours. These were a Christmas gift so they did not get used until Christmas day. On two of the four paddles the glue started letting go after only 3-4 games. One additional paddle started letting go after another couple of days. Today is 12/29/15. This is completely unacceptable for a product of this caliber. These paddles are an easy 4.5 - 5 star product except for the Q/C issues. Maybe we got some old product ...maybe not. If not, they have not fixed the quality control issues that were identified by previous buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: Coming unglued
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a few years ago - coming back to write review to say that all the paddles are coming unglued (after moderate use at best). The back and red tops are separating from the material underneath. And the strips that go around the edge of the paddle are also nearly all unglued. I realize these aren't anywhere near top end paddles, but no reason for this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fairly fast and I am very pleased with the overall quality of the product. Would greatly recommend for those who are unsure about it's quality and durability. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: MapleGroundCo.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made Paddles
customer_reviews.text: Just received this 4 set and the paddles are very poorly made, the handles have a very rough finish and the material used to make the actual paddle seems to be a composite that will easily disintegrate. The rubber is pulling away from each of the 4 paddles after only a couple hours of play. It's as though the rubber is barely glued on. I know these are not high end paddles but I expected much more from the Killerspin brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chautauqua

customer_reviews.title: Good paddles at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Solid paddle for mid level players. Bought these as a gift and they really enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Edge banding material is very flimsy and will fall of quickly. This exposes the wooden edge of the paddle and the face material. Looks poorly constructed
customer_reviews.author: Jagman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good paddles for the price, was hoping they would be a bit stickier but everyone likes them
customer_reviews.author: landy w.

customer_reviews.title: I have a KILLER spin:-)
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for the price. Had to glue the tag on the handle back on one of them after a particularly heated ping pong game.....but that was no biggie:-)
customer_reviews.author: lizardshop

customer_reviews.title: Great Midlin Paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, lightweight, and fair priced, this is a good set. I have had these paddles for about one year now, and the are still the same as when I bought them. If you have a Ping Pong table, you are going to want four for when you have friends over. They have an almost sticky rubber on both sides, allowing for GREAT ball spin. The fit nicely in your hand. When the get dirty, run them under cold water and they are like new again. Great, flawless product, just what I wanted, and would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginner to novice players
customer_reviews.text: This set of four paddles is a great set for novice table tennis players like my family. They have heft, but are not heavy. The ball comes off the paddle face predictably and with nice feel. I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Work great for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: Work great for my purposes. A big improvement over my old paddles which had old dried out rubber. Easier than trying to recover those.
customer_reviews.author: Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: paddles falling apart. My kids dropped one the handle pops off. I glued it. The next week another falls apart! I am so disapointted. Its not like they are being abused and used daily!!! The look real nice but one mistake you have junk!
customer_reviews.author: Does it matter?

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a four racket set of Stiga and these are much much better quality. This, in my view, is a great value. These rackets have a decent amount of cushion for free swingers and plenty of tack to impart spin. They're not the best rackets you are going to buy but this is a good set to have with any table.
customer_reviews.author: 4America

customer_reviews.title: she and all her friends absolutely LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these paddles for our Grand Daughter for her new ping pong table for Christmas .... she and all her friends absolutely LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph R. Brescia

customer_reviews.title: ... this set at Christmas and I have been very disappointed. The paddles have all peeled and two of ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set at Christmas and I have been very disappointed. The paddles have all peeled and two of the handles have cracked and broken..one paddle could not be repaired... Two of them taped together in order to use. Not at all the quality I expected for the price... The use has been mild and they were not mishandled...Have ordered new ones which when they arrive, these will be discarded..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Detailed review for Jet 200
customer_reviews.text: These paddles are wrapped individually and package contains 3 white and 3 yellow killerspin balls. For the price, it is a good deal. Rubbers have good traction, the thickness of the blade is fine. However, I just feel the handles are little bit small. Other than that, I like it. Overall, it is a good pedal for casual plays. Definitely worth to buy.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly worth the amount.
customer_reviews.text: The edge was a bit disconnected from some of the paddles and it doesn't come with storage bag, which I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Green Boy

customer_reviews.title: Lower Quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The rubber had very small pieces come off around the edges the first day. Some of the rubber is also loose on a couple of them. Nothing too terrible and the rackets are still 100% useful.
customer_reviews.author: Blue92

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! all paddles are different weights, so everyone gets to pick a favorite. Balls it came with were kinda cheap, but can't beat the price for 4 paddles and a handful of balls.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: balls are crap. we had to but new ones the very ...
customer_reviews.text: paddles ok. balls are crap . we had to but new ones the very first weekend we used them.
customer_reviews.author: tkam

customer_reviews.title: good quality and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift, my family loves them, already using them and says they are very good quality. Would buy again. Shipped quickly so arrived in time for a birthday, which is a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: bowlingmom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. These are really nice paddles and the rubber is STICKY!!! Amazing spin with these and great balls!
customer_reviews.author: toddl

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddles
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. These should hold-up for many years. Only reason I deducted a star was because the rubber surface of the paddle is a bit sticky and tends to attract dirt/lint. But a regular cleaning keeps this under control.
customer_reviews.author: MrBCaShopper

customer_reviews.title: Best set for casual play !
customer_reviews.text: Great for casual play and works very well. Very balanced and sturdy ! value for money for sure
customer_reviews.author: Bullgod

customer_reviews.title: Bought to go with new table
customer_reviews.text: I bought a conversion top for our pool table, and couldn't let people play with old paddles, so bought these to replace our old ping pong paddles. They work great! It helps make the game more fun to use good equipment.
customer_reviews.author: gundy57

customer_reviews.title: The surface area is kind of squishy and takes a ...
customer_reviews.text: The surface area is kind of squishy and takes a bit of time to get used to. But, once you are used to it, you don't want to go back to the traditional paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father in law as a Christmas gift and he was impressed with the quality of these paddles. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Short term investment only!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, except that the edges started to peel only after a couple weeks of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.......although killer spin has great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Handle fell off the same day we got it...rubber was peeling of shortly there after. Not worth the money......
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Above average
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use. I'm not a serious player. Better than the standard paddle. The grip is fine, but its bare wood.
customer_reviews.author: Moka

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Quality control is not very good for this product. I received three paddles that were red on one side and dark on the other. The fourth paddle was dark on both sides. They still function but it's disappointing to have a brand new, mis-matched set of paddles. Not worth returning the entire set but there does not seem to be a way to get just one of the paddles replaced.
customer_reviews.author: John Pestotnik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice beginner set for the family, will enjoy over and over!
customer_reviews.author: 28Ground Breaker

customer_reviews.title: Racquets are great! Spent half our time chasing down the 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Racquets are great! Spent half our time chasing down the 6 balls so we ordered a bag of 50 balls for about $11. Now we can get a good 30-minute workout before we have to round up balls!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Good started set. The paddles have almost no spin. If you are used to a butterfly or stiga paddle with a spin of 7 or better, you'll be disappointed. These paddles have good control, speed can be rated around 5 or 6 at best. I would rate the spin at 6 at best. The balls that come with this set are single star balls, so don't expect too much out of them. Overall, as I had mentioned, it's a great set for beginners, not for someone who plays more than 3 times weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: ok for price. side decals falling off right out of box
customer_reviews.author: james herrera

customer_reviews.title: THESE HAVE BEEN GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME SET!! WE HAVE BEEN USING ABOUT 2 MONTHS AND NOTHING NEGATIVE CAN BE SAID ABOUT THESE!!! THEY'RE GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fine
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for a bunch of 7-10yr olds
customer_reviews.author: J. Marr

customer_reviews.title: bad imitation..
customer_reviews.text: this really a bad cheap product, imitation, so sad with this purchase..
customer_reviews.author: rolyn santamaria or reyna santamaria

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: A quality set of paddles with decent spin. I can topspin forehand smash it from 4 feet away from the table now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Suspect Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not bad as a paddle but the rubber starts coming off after only a few games. Some decent contact or rubber cement will be needed soon.
customer_reviews.author: LouKY6165

customer_reviews.title: Solid paddles
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of these. My only beef is when i went to take the plastic protection cover off the rubber starting pulling off with it. either the rubber needs to be glued better or the plastic protection sheet needs to be adhered less firmly.
customer_reviews.author: wilmingtonkat

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: work as it described, but I think the quality is sub-expectation.
customer_reviews.author: michtiger

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles. They are very comfortable. The best paddles we have ever had. They are sturdy and seem to hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Paddles are of good quality. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Paddle set works perfectly with JOOLA Conversion Table Tennis Top!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a fantastic price with lightening fast shipping!! Great seller!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ~MOORHEAT~

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this when we bought our ping pong table. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set! They are danky.
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles and I like these ball because they're heavier than typical 3 star ones.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this rackets. They have a very good control, velocity and effects performance. They are lightweight but very tough, I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at the right price point. Very comfortable grips. We are extremely pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Killer Rackets
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as pictured. Picked by a serious Table Tennis Crew at work. They are used everyday and get a lot of wear and love them.
customer_reviews.author: mgd in SF

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Handles broke after less than a year of occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Deal. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. Good grip on the paddles and the balls are decent too.
customer_reviews.author: Alison K Keddington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Paddles are a super step up from entry level ones. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work well but a part of sticker around the paddle was peeeling after playing just a few times.
customer_reviews.author: TX mom

customer_reviews.title: The paddles have a strong off-putting chemical smell and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The paddles have a strong off-putting chemical smell and the wooden handles are not very smooth. We are returning these.
customer_reviews.author: snowyowl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing spin with very comfortable grip
customer_reviews.text: Amazing spin with very comfortable grip. Makes the game way more fun due to the ability to top spin and curve the ball.
customer_reviews.author: C4mack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of "group grade" paddles. Great value.. Good rubber and sponge ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles. Will buy this brand if and when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal 5 Stars A++ RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a group center they are now the favorites. Good spin and fast action. I gave these to the Rec Center, and they have held up to hard play for a year now, 5 Stars A++ RECOMMENDED VOTE thumbs UP IF YOU FOUND THIS HELPFUL
customer_reviews.author: DaPoppa1

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not much performance and starts peeling pretty fast. Ok for price
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: 4 racket set
customer_reviews.text: Killerspin jet set 4 table tennis racket set or Nice paddles, I would buy them again. Or tell a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Nice paddles and balls - these paddles can put a wicked spin on your serve!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Flake

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great paddles
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect starter set for me and my family. Far suprerior to a normal paddle! Nice feel and good control overall.
customer_reviews.author: Leesburg Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles. Well
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and as advertised. Great paddles. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and has good quality at a affordable price
customer_reviews.author: mh

customer_reviews.title: but this worked great. A couple of step up from generic sporting ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a pro, but this worked great. A couple of step up from generic sporting goods store. One draw back, the handle inerst fell out in one game from two panels....just use gorilla glue to fix.
customer_reviews.author: SJB POWERS

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The surface ripped easily and the handles are angular and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Grant R Webber

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it - appears to be very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this - it seems like a really good deal. Killerspin seems to make good-quality table tennis products. I'm a complete newbie to TT products - first time owning rackets, but these seem of very good quality for the price and level of play. I've been using them purely for in-house recreation for about a week now and they play fine. One thing I didn't realize was that this package ships with (3x) 1-star orange balls and (3x) 1-star white balls. Used them a bit - seem fine for 1-star balls. Definitely recommend for in-door recreation play.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.text: Good but not great, even for this price. Coming of a pair of relatively cheap Stigas, I found these to be fairly heavy, and they didn't add as much to our game as I would have expected. But they are solid paddles for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: farcha

customer_reviews.title: Good product/value
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the grip of the rubber on this paddles. Nice spin and control (and look) for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Killerspin
customer_reviews.text: Lots of spin is evident on the balls hit, but the wood is not as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Killerspin Paddles
customer_reviews.text: We've used these paddles for more than one event and they are a great paddle for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris George

customer_reviews.title: Good Racket set for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: These rackets are well built and play so much better than the basic rackets you find at Target, Big Five or Walmart. Not professional grade but great for the recreational player that wants to improve their game.
customer_reviews.author: chidas

customer_reviews.title: Replacement paddles
customer_reviews.text: Replacement paddles for those that came with the table. These are nice quality - just wish it came in plain colors instead. The picture is very busy. Shippper shipped package quickly. Received on time and in great condition. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We love our Killerspin table, but these paddles are terrible. The rubber surfaces are tearing around the edges as well as separating from the paddles. Durability has been non-existent. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles. We don't allow custom paddles at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles. We don't allow custom paddles at the house, everyone has to choose from the same options and these are top-notch.
customer_reviews.author: Fm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 60 years of experience tells me - excellent bats and balls. Used them 2 days now.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Kluge

customer_reviews.title: Good paddles for price
customer_reviews.text: Overall good paddles for the price... Just it is a shame handles aren't finished nicer,they are only stained blue... Sometimes little details make add a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: satified
customer_reviews.text: Thoght for the price I would very impressed just good. Next time I will go to a store to look before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Rocking Paddles
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic paddles, excellent value, these things are incredible for the price and a HUGE upgrade over your Walmart/Target entry paddles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Killerspin JET SET 4 Ping Pong Paddle Set with 6 Balls – Beginner Table Tennis Racket Set| 5 Layer Wood Blade, Jet Basic Rubbers, Flared Handle| Practice Quality Ping Pong Racket Set|
product_meta.description:
The JET SET 4 is the perfect ping pong paddle set for beginners, kids and guests. Killerspin is the leader in table tennis equipment. Our 5 layer wood blade construction and Jet Basic rubbers are designed for recreational ping pong players who want to improve their game and dazzle the competition!

Perfect your Skills

JET SET 4 paddles have a balanced design and comfortable flare grip that your hands can fall in love with. The secret lies in the 5 layer wood blade and the Jet Basic rubbers. The JET SET 4 paddles are perfect for honing skills, and perfecting your game. 

A Perfect Gift 

The JET SET 4 table tennis racket set comes with 4 paddles and 6 balls. It is the perfect gift for any ping pong table owner, or beginning player. It is also the perfect addition to your personal table tennis equipment collection. Protect your nice rackets from less experienced players, by providing guests and children with these quality communal ping pong bats, or give the set as a gift to the host of your next ping pong party. 

Specifications

Paddle Quantity: 4

Ping Pong Ball Quantity: 6

Layers: 5 Wood 

Rubbers: 2 Jet Basic 

Spin: 5.5

Power: 6.5

Control: 5

Dimensions: 6Ó x6 1/8Ó


Activity for the Digital Generation

Table tennis offers an escape from the digital world. The sport provides a welcome means of unplugging and connecting with others through physical activity. Killerspin is committed to creating connections between people. Our #UnPlugNPlay movement embodies this commitment. 

Killerspin Family

The Killerspin family consists of industry experts, professional ping pong players, and people who genuinely love the sport and want to help others connect through time at the table. Our passion is evident throughout the Killerspin line of products. 

Click ÒAdd to CartÓ and buy now!



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Killerspin was built to bring youth and innovation to one of the world's most beautiful sports: table tennis. The Chicago-based company produces premium-quality table tennis equipment, sports apparel and media. Killerspin was created to serve the table tennis player, while providing U.S. homes and offices aesthetically pleasing table tennis gear for head-turning style and competition-level play.
feature_bullets: 🏓 A PERFECT SET – Killerspin JET SET 4 Ping Pong Paddle and 6 Ball set is perfect for entertaining, or for stocking your table tennis equipment closet. It will make everybody happy, and it also makes a great gift set.
🏓 SHARPEN YOUR SKILLS – These paddles will transform recreational players into fierce competitors in no time. The forgiving paddles offer better shot control and improved power.
🏓 SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION – The blade is constructed of 5 layers of wood and covered in Killerspin’s Jet Basic rubbers. Flexible PVC tape surrounds the ping pong racket to protect the perimeter.
🏓 LEARN CONTROL – Our JET SET 4 table tennis bats are designed for learning basic strokes and perfecting ball control. The wood handle is flared for comfort and offers incredible command of the ball.
🏓 COMFORTABLE HANDLE - The handle to this table tennis paddle is made to fit any hand size and feel like you are one with the game.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
